actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Act to allow certain transportation and sales of natural gas to municipalities not subject to such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Natural Gas Act to exempt certain transportation and sales of natural gas to municipalities from the provisions of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Act to allow certain transportation and sales of natural gas to municipalities not subject to such Act.
